title: belialuine
author: belialuine
content: Shiba and Shina's son was born, his name is Shuggi !https://i.ibb.co/RyYxLDt/Ftz-Ia-Ft-Xs-AA0k-HM.jpgHello everyone, I'm writing this post as a call for culture on the BitcoinTalk forum which I respect and which is a legend for all crypto elders.I recently made a discovery via social networks and I especially distinguished a community unprecedented for many years around a memecoin symbolized $SHUGGI.The story goes that a newborn has arrived in the Shibas family, it's Shuggi. The latter is the son of two very famous characters: Shiba and Shina.Parents always want their children to succeed, and I believe this community is truly dedicated to making this token the success it richly deserves.You will judge for yourself, but for me it was essential to come here among you to talk about it.Here is their website: www.shuggitoken.comGroup chat link: www.t.me/shuggitokenTogether, we will always be stronger. If you are a cool kid, you already know.Ad Astra Per Aspera

comments.author: CryptoJava11
comments.body: Wow !! Very nice I will definitely have a look ! These kind of memecoins can be surprising sometimes. I kept watching SHIB and many others, but the power of community is very something.
